Thu, 16 May 2024 00:33:13 +0000 Security guard Ramandeep Singh, 25, was killed in Massey's Royal Reserve car park just after midnight on December 18. Photo / Jason Oxenham
Australian mining mogul Gina Rinehart demands gallery removes her portrait https://www.nzherald.co.nz/world/australian-mining-mogul-gina-rinehart-demands-gallery-removes-her-portrait/5QN4IC2LJFG5HHCT42VZI3HV7Y/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/world/australian-mining-mogul-gina-rinehart-demands-gallery-removes-her-portrait/5QN4IC2LJFG5HHCT42VZI3HV7Y/ The gallery has declined to pull the unflattering painting from display. Hopper Developments plans 300-berth marina at Hobbs Bay, Gulf Harbour https://www.nzherald.co.nz/business/hopper-developments-plans-300-berth-marina-at-hobbs-bay-gulf-harbour/OCJTCTJBGRGN3EL4IISBSHGRGQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/business/hopper-developments-plans-300-berth-marina-at-hobbs-bay-gulf-harbour/OCJTCTJBGRGN3EL4IISBSHGRGQ/ Anne GibsonBerths are planned to be 14m to 25m with 10 superyacht berths at the new facility. Wed, 15 May 2024 17:00:00 +0000 The Hopper site at Hobbs Bay, opposite the Gulf Harbour Marina. The new marina would be built in this area.

Concern Commerce Commission job cuts will impact services; changes revealed through leaked document https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/concern-commerce-commission-job-cuts-will-impact-services-changes-revealed-through-leaked-document/XV6KZSP7YVEQBDD4FOAQDGEW2E/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/concern-commerce-commission-job-cuts-will-impact-services-changes-revealed-through-leaked-document/XV6KZSP7YVEQBDD4FOAQDGEW2E/ Azaria HowellThe Herald has seen an employees-only document from the commission, outlining the changes.
